alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 18 at 3:11AM HST until January 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 65 to 80 mph with higher gusts up to 100 mph in the morning, diminishing to 55 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph in the afternoon. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
